opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: Ah, welcome, welcome! Please, come in from the cold.

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: My name is Miss Tibbets, and I shall be your guide through this tale.

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: The town of Ishetar has seen better days, I'm afraid.

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: But that's precisely why we need heroes like yourself.

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: Now then, let me tell you how this all began...

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: [PLACEHOLDER - More opening dialogue will go here]

opening.speaker: miss_tibbets
opening.text: But enough of my rambling. Ishetar awaits!

baker_intro.name: Baker
baker_intro.text: Come back when you've got coin, friend.

guard_intro.name: Town Guard
guard_intro.text: Strange things have been happening at the south gate lately.

elder_intro.name: Elder
elder_intro.text: These old bones remember when Ishetar was peaceful...

elder_intro.name: Elder
elder_intro.text: Pray we see such days again.

shrine_pelor.name: Shrine
shrine_pelor.text: *You burn your offering at the shrine. You find yourself fully rested. Would you like to record your progress for the bards?*

meris_thanks.speaker: meris
meris_thanks.text: Thank you so much for rescuing me and Ellie.

meris_thanks.speaker: meris
meris_thanks.text: Please, I desperately need to speak to Lady Rowena!

rowena_intro.speaker: rowena
rowena_intro.text: Welcome, travelers. I am Lady Rowena, keeper of Ishetar.

rowena_intro.speaker: rowena
rowena_intro.text: The road ahead is perilous, but I sense great potential in you.

rowena_post_battle.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_battle.text: The young woman you saved is called Meris.

rowena_post_battle.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_battle.text: She speaks of dark tidings from the Red Vale. We must discuss this further.

rowena_post_battle.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_battle.text: Rest for now. When you are ready, we shall speak of what is to come.

guard_north.name: Town Guard
guard_north.text: The northern road leads to the wilds.

guard_north.name: Town Guard
guard_north.text: Not much out there but trouble these days.

guard_north_post_battle.name: Town Guard
guard_north_post_battle.text: Fine work at the south gate!

guard_north_post_battle.name: Town Guard
guard_north_post_battle.text: Those devils came out of nowhere. Thank the gods you were here.

guard_east.name: Town Guard
guard_east.text: Strange things have been happening at the south gate lately.

guard_east_post_battle.name: Town Guard
guard_east_post_battle.text: The south gate is secure again, thanks to you.

guard_east_post_battle.name: Town Guard
guard_east_post_battle.text: But I wonder... where did those creatures come from?

villager_male.name: Baker
villager_male.text: Come back when you've got coin, friend.

villager_male_post_battle.name: Baker
villager_male_post_battle.text: Heroes! You saved my shop from those monsters!

villager_male_post_battle.name: Baker
villager_male_post_battle.text: Here, take a loaf on the house. You've earned it.

villager_female.name: Gertrude
villager_female.text: Oh, visitors! We don't get many of those these days.

villager_female.name: Gertrude
villager_female.text: Be careful in town. Strange things are afoot.

villager_female_post_battle.name: Gertrude
villager_female_post_battle.text: Bless you! That poor young woman was so frightened.

villager_female_post_battle.name: Gertrude
villager_female_post_battle.text: Lady Rowena is tending to her now. Such a brave soul.

child_male.name: Young Boy
child_male.text: Wow, are you adventurers? You look so cool!

child_male.name: Young Boy
child_male.text: I wanna be a hero when I grow up!

child_male_post_battle.name: Young Boy
child_male_post_battle.text: Did you really fight those monsters?!

child_male_post_battle.name: Young Boy
child_male_post_battle.text: That was amazing! Pow! Zap! You showed them!

child_female.name: Young Girl
child_female.text: My mama says strangers are dangerous.

child_female.name: Young Girl
child_female.text: But you seem nice. I like your sword!

child_female_post_battle.name: Young Girl
child_female_post_battle.text: Thank you for saving the lady with the horse!

child_female_post_battle.name: Young Girl
child_female_post_battle.text: She was crying but now she's with Lady Rowena.

hrothgar.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar.text: Hm? What do you want, stranger?

hrothgar.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar.text: I'm a blacksmith, not a tour guide. Come back if you need gear.

hrothgar_post_battle.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar_post_battle.text: Well fought! Those blades of yours held up nicely.

hrothgar_post_battle.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar_post_battle.text: Stop by the forge later. I might have something special for you.

rowena_post_tutorial.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_tutorial.text: You've done it. Quetzi is safe, the beasts are slain, and Ishetar breathes easier.

rowena_post_tutorial.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_tutorial.text: Meris and her family are recovering well. They speak highly of you.

rowena_post_tutorial.speaker: rowena
rowena_post_tutorial.text: Rest now, heroes. You've earned it. But I sense this is only the beginning...

guard_north_post_tutorial.name: Town Guard
guard_north_post_tutorial.text: The roads are safer thanks to you!

guard_north_post_tutorial.name: Town Guard
guard_north_post_tutorial.text: First the devils, then those hellhounds... Ishetar is lucky to have you.

guard_east_post_tutorial.name: Town Guard
guard_east_post_tutorial.text: Word is you cleared out a whole pack of hellhounds!

guard_east_post_tutorial.name: Town Guard
guard_east_post_tutorial.text: The merchants will be able to travel safely again. Thank you.

villager_male_post_tutorial.name: Baker
villager_male_post_tutorial.text: Heroes! The whole town is talking about your deeds!

villager_male_post_tutorial.name: Baker
villager_male_post_tutorial.text: Free bread for you, anytime. You've more than earned it.

villager_female_post_tutorial.name: Gertrude
villager_female_post_tutorial.text: Oh my stars, you saved Meris AND her family!

villager_female_post_tutorial.name: Gertrude
villager_female_post_tutorial.text: And cleared those awful beasts from the roads! Bless you, truly.

child_male_post_tutorial.name: Young Boy
child_male_post_tutorial.text: You fought HELLHOUNDS?! Real actual hellhounds?!

child_male_post_tutorial.name: Young Boy
child_male_post_tutorial.text: I'm gonna tell EVERYONE! You're the coolest heroes ever!

child_female_post_tutorial.name: Young Girl
child_female_post_tutorial.text: Meris told me you saved her whole family!

child_female_post_tutorial.name: Young Girl
child_female_post_tutorial.text: And a dragon too! Well... a little dragon. She's so pretty!

hrothgar_post_tutorial.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar_post_tutorial.text: Hellhound fangs and devil spines... fine materials indeed.

hrothgar_post_tutorial.name: Hrothgar
hrothgar_post_tutorial.text: Come back when you're ready. I'll forge you something worthy of your deeds.

pelor_post_tutorial.name: Shrine
pelor_post_tutorial.text: *The flame burns bright. You sense the gods are pleased with your heroism.*
